lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Oct. 8 (AP) -- A large merchant ship was heavily damaged in renewed German air assaults last night in the Suez area, the High Command said today.
abstract: Germans claim merchant ship hit in Suez area air raid

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
